tweet: I am a friend of @SocialMediaMo and he told me he has the greatest people following him.
@BarbaraFriedman Thank you for the follow. Just got started with Twitter so any help would be appreciated.
The only people with whom you should try to get even are those who have helped you - John E. Southard
It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit - Harry Truman
